org.zollty.util.json

接口 DefaultWriter

  • 所有超级接口:
    JSONWriter

    public interface DefaultWriter
extends JSONWriter
    从以下版本开始:
    2014-5-17
    作者:
    zollty

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void write(char c)
      inner basic write method: write CHAR to out stream directly
      void write(char[] data, int offset, int count)
      inner basic write method: write data to out stream directly
      void write(CharSequence text)
      inner basic write method: write text to out stream directly
      void write(int c)
      inner basic write method: write INT to out stream directly
      void write(long c)
      inner basic write method: write LONG to out stream directly
      void writeDate(Date date)
      extend method: write Date json value ,such as: "2014-12-03".
      void writeNull()
      inner assistant method: write null json value: null
      void writeSimpleString(CharSequence text)
      inner assistant method: write String json value: "text".
      void writeString(String value)
      default support method: write String json value: "text".

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.zollty.util.json.JSONWriter

        writeArray, writeCollection, writeCompositeData, writeError, writeMap, writeObject, writeTabularData

    • 方法详细资料

      • write

        void write(CharSequence text)
        inner basic write method: write text to out stream directly

      • write

        void write(char[] data,
         int offset,
         int count)
        inner basic write method: write data to out stream directly

      • write

        void write(char c)
        inner basic write method: write CHAR to out stream directly

      • write

        void write(int c)
        inner basic write method: write INT to out stream directly

      • write

        void write(long c)
        inner basic write method: write LONG to out stream directly

      • writeNull

        void writeNull()
        inner assistant method: write null json value: null

      • writeSimpleString

        void writeSimpleString(CharSequence text)
        inner assistant method: write String json value: "text". Look up: this method will not change or escape the string, distinguish from writeString(String)
        另请参阅:
        writeString(String)

      • writeString

        void writeString(String value)
        default support method: write String json value: "text". Look up: this method will change the string to compatible standard json format ( and may support other transform purpose such as browser html escape. )

      • writeDate

        void writeDate(Date date)
        extend method: write Date json value ,such as: "2014-12-03".
